name: Hi. I'm lonely. But I'm trying.
name_original: Hi. I'm lonely. But I'm trying.
description:
Controls
WASD - Movement
Mouse - Interact
Space - Jump

Objective
Gather shapes and bring them to other critters. Click the critter and drag a shape into their speech bubble if its a compatible shape your confidence will go up! Keep moving or your loneliness will get you.

Summary

This is Chaos Critters unofficial entry to the Global Game Jam of 2022 with the theme of duality. We used the modifiers of Cute, coming together, and emotional response. 
This game was made within 48 hours and we hope you enjoy it.
